:::{.cleanbox}
This post will consist of a number of recipes for setting up a number of basic [Basilisk](http://basilisk.fr) simulations, with a focus on 3D domains.

While the documentation consists of a large number of detailed examples, I don't think there is enough effort placed to outline the 'building blocks'.
:::



```{c}
int main() {
  run();
}
```
